about_the_game:
The original intention of development
After releasing two visual novels on domestic mobile platforms, we changed the name of the studio from HK GAME to Terminal Theatre Soft, the official translation of the final drama. We believe this is an interesting and meaningful name, and we want to create games with unique stories, even though they are not rich in length and content, after all, I am still a solo developer in school, but I hope that the short story will impress players. With this in mind, I made this game the summer after graduating from high school. We'll be releasing other genres with richer gameplay in our future college life, but still in the studio's story-focused style.

Content of this game
This game is a single-branch visual novel and does not have many endings. Because in the author's mind, the best ending of a story often has one, and we want players to accept this ending. Similar to the previous two games, this theme incorporates elements of mythology, creating a small world of two people with the theme of tragic love. A distant and tragic story is told.

How to play
Visual novels, which browse the plot by clicking through the plot, have individual branching options that affect the plot but not the ending.

Game duration
About half an hour or more
